headline: 5 Dividend Stocks to Buy With $2,000 and Hold Forever
summary: Dividend stocks can provide investors with regular payments, making them ideal for those seeking passive income.  Because dividend payers tend to have sound, stable businesses, they can be a good source of income and stock price appreciation.  Investing in the stock market is an excellent way to build long-term wealth.
